gov.usgs.anss.inventory

Class TreeItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.inventory.Item
      • gov.usgs.anss.inventory.TreeItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable

    public class TreeItem
extends Item
implements java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable
    TreeItem.java Created on April 22, 2003, 11:22 AM Note : this class extends Items providing overrides primarily for toString() and other behaviors needed by it being in a tree. It also implements the Transferable interface to allow Tree gestures to move data. In the Inv this means enforcing that only TreeItems can be dragged and dropped. Basically the tree stands alone made up a DefaultImmutableTreeNodes which have TreeItems as objects (below the TreeRoots).

        create a tree item from variables. Calls the super class
        Parameters:
        inID - The database ID
        loc - A String with the location
        pers - Owners ID
        ag - Owning agency
        g - The G number
        acquired - Date item added to inventory system
        equip - The ID of the equip_type
        sub - Subtable ID
        locID - The location ID
        desc - Extra description
        input - Input power setting
        op - Operating status from enum

      • createDefaultMutableTreeNode

        public javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode createDefaultMutableTreeNode(javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeModel treeModel,
                                                                            javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode parent,
                                                                            int index)
        createDefaultMutableTreeNode takes this tree item and attaches it to the named parent as the index th child. It is the primary way to add a tree item to an existing tree.
        Parameters:
        treeModel - The tree model being used. Normally the DefaultTreeModel.
        parent - The DefaultMutableTreeNode to add this treeItem to
        index - This node is to the the 'index'th child of the parent
        Returns:
        The DefaultMutatbleTreeNode thus created and inserted

      • getTransferDataFlavors

        public java.awt.datatransfer.DataFlavor[] getTransferDataFlavors()
        One of the Transferable Interface routines. getTransferDataFlavors() returns the TreeItem as the only flavor
        Specified by:
        getTransferDataFlavors in interface java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable
        Returns:

      • isDataFlavorSupported

        public boolean isDataFlavorSupported(java.awt.datatransfer.DataFlavor f)
        One of the Transferable Interface routines. isDataFlavorSupported() return true if this argument is a TreeItem
        Specified by:
        isDataFlavorSupported in interface java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable
        Parameters:
        f - The proposed flavor for the transfer
        Returns:
